A visual stimulation deliver assessment habituation visual evoke potential volunteer ( VEP-habituation ) follow measure evaluate visual stimulation : ( ) Motor Evoked Potentials ( MEP ) ; ( ii ) Motor Threshold ( MT ) ; ( iii ) Short Interval Cortical Inhibition ( SICI ) ; ( iv ) Intracortical Facilitation ( lCF ) ( v ) Phosphene Threshold ( PT ) .
